name: mindflip
description: ## graphql query = viewFlashCards, viewFlashCard, viewUsers, viewFriends mutation = addFlashCard, updateFlashCard, deleteFlashCard, addFriend, updateFriend, deleteFriend

scripts.install: cd ../client && npm install && cd server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js

author: Brittani Court
